Class Game

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer

Constructor Detail

Game

public Game(boolean antiKingGame)
Constructs a new non-timed Game with a new-game setup Board

Effects:
Constructs a new Game g, with:

(g.piecesLost = false) &&

(g.checkMate = false) &&

(g.timeExpired = false) &&

(g.gameOver = false) &&

(g.whiteLost = false) &&

(g.inCheck = false) &&

(g.inAntiCheck = false) &&

(g.whiteInCheck = false) &&

(g.isWhiteTurn = false) &&

(g.antiKingGame = antiKingGame) &&

(g.whiteTimed = false) &&

(g.blackTimed = false) &&

(g.board = new Board(antiKingGame)) &&

(g.whiteClock = new PlayerClock(0)) &&

(g.blackClock = new PlayerClock(0)) &&

(g.moveHistory = new ArrayList())

Game

public Game(boolean antiKingGame,
            int whiteTime,
            int blackTime)
Constructs a new timed Game with a new-game setup Board

Effects:
Constructs a new Game g, with:

(g.piecesLost = false) &&

(g.checkMate = false) &&

(g.timeExpired = false) &&

(g.gameOver = false) &&

(g.whiteLost = false) &&

(g.inCheck = false) &&

(g.inAntiCheck = false) &&

(g.whiteInCheck = false) &&

(g.isWhiteTurn = false) &&

(g.antiKingGame = antiKingGame) &&

(g.whiteTimed = true) iff (whiteTime != 0) &&

(g.blackTimed = true) iff (blackTime != 0) &&

(g.board = new Board(antiKingGame)) &&

(g.whiteClock = new PlayerClock(whiteTime)) &&

(g.blackClock = new PlayerClock(blackTime)) &&

(g.moveHistory = new ArrayList())

Method Detail

update

public void update(java.util.Observable a,
                   java.lang.Object b)
This method is called by the classes this game observes. It is only called by the white and black player clocks. It can cause the game to end if the timers signify that the time for one player has expired.

Specified by:
update in interface java.util.Observer

setTimeExpired

public void setTimeExpired(boolean whiteExpired)
This method is called when the TextUI claims that time has expired It sets this.gameOver to true, this.timeExpired to true, and sets whiteLost to true if whiteExpired = true, false otherwise

Parameters:
whiteExpired -
Effects:
Sets this.gameOver = true, this.timeExpired = true, and if whiteExpired = true, sets this.whiteLost = true, false otherwise

signalMove

public void signalMove()
This method signals that a move has been made, and that the game has been updated. It will notify its observers of any necessary changes, and will then notify them that the turn has changed.

makeMove

public boolean makeMove(Move move)
Applies a given move to this game if it is valid.

Parameters:
move - : The move being applied.
Returns:
True iff the given move was applied to the game.
Requires:
(move != null)
Effects:
Iff the move is applied to the game, the turn changes, and the board and game fields are updated accordingly.

startGame

public void startGame()
This method signals the start of a game to all of this game's observers.

Effects:
Starts the whiteClock

getLastMove

public MoveHistoryObject getLastMove()
Returns the latest MoveHistoryObject that has been created

Returns:
The latest MoveHistoryObject that has been created

removeObservers

public void removeObservers()
Removes all of the observers observing this game, and removes all of objects that this game observes.

Effects:
Removes all of the observers observing this game, and removes all of the objects that this game observes.

                         int time)

Parameters:

time - : The time at which the move was initially made
Requires:

Effects:

Parameters:

Returns:

isWhiteInCheck

public boolean isWhiteInCheck()
Returns true iff the white player is currently in check, fals iff the black player is currently in check, and is undetermined iff no player is currently in check. ***This method is only called when it is certain that a player is in check.

Returns:
True iff the white player is in check, false iff the black player is currently in check, and an unknown boolean iff no player is currently in check
